title: 142 perches Mahogany Land - Piliyandala
details:
142.14 perches Mahogany land near the Bolgoda Lake at Dampe Piliyandala.

20 feet wide Road to the Land

Near Dampe Village Hotel and TNL.

Ideal for Future investment, Tourist Hotel/Villa,

10 minutes Drive From Piliyandala town and Piliyandala - Katubedda Road,

Clear tittle & approved plan,

Calm & quiet environment for living,

Highly developing & Residential area,


Considering Part Exchange -Land Cruiser / Prado /Rexton /Montero / Pajero Inter cooler /Mercedes Benz / B M W / Audi - and the balance by cash

For further information pls call
0774 204020
